ai-patthana8.46:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.46:1.1_0: Name gives rise to diversity of principles.
ai-patthana8.46:1.1_1: Not grasping gives rise to diversity of phenomena.
ai-patthana8.46:1.1_2: Not dependently originated phenomena don’t arise dependent on principle.
ai-patthana8.46:2.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the phenomena that give rise to causes.
ai-patthana8.46:4.1_0: That is the cause, relying on three things that reliest on letting go five aggregates ... five spiritual companions ...
